channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Bounty Hunter
channel.description:
Class Type: Neutral Offensive (Due to able to help anyone including Evils and BD. Also the NK's)
Passive: Focus: Occupied immune
Day Ability 1: (infinite)-
Collecting Bounties: Select a player, that player will be able to select anyone for the Bounty Hunter to kill (Except Revive Player.) You and the player can decline the bounty. (Can only do this one in a day. The next offer you must accept or no bounty tonight)
Day Ability 2:
Night Ability 1: (Infinite)
Assassinate: Kill the Bounty tonight
Night Ability 2 (Infinite)
Burn Bounty: Burns the Bounty contract
Extra: If gets debauch, will not kill the Drunk, will do nothing in that night. Can kill after killing the first 3 bounties.
Goal: Kill 3 bounties you have collected.
Lore: Unknown Man figures out this Kingdom is in chaos. People will want to kill each other. The man kills a person who was supposed to go to the Court. He went to the Court, he can feel the intensity in the air. It is time to collect some bounties.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Bounty Hunter
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
My opinions? Cool idea. Just needs to be slightly tweaked.

Passives:
Fulfilled: If you have successfully killed 3 of your bounties, you are conversion immune.
(This is to prevent converted to lose to help my conversion idea down below)

Burn Bounty should be a day ability. They will be alerted that their bounty has been burnt.

Night Abilities:
Undercover: 2 uses. You gain night immunity for the night.

(Alch and Merc have their own survivability abilities. Neutrals need this imo)

I think it should be convertable but can only be converted if he hasn’t won already:

The Hitman: Unseen Support
Win Condition: Kill the BD and all those who oppose the Unseen

Passives:
Focus: Occupy immune

Day Abilities:
Reject: 1 use. Show a fake alert that the bounty was burnt to your previous client.

Night Abilities:
Patch: 1 use. Shows all Unseen as not suspicious to Sheriff.
Loyalty: 3 uses. Will kill the target for the Assassin. (This is for protecting the current assassin if he is trusted by BD)

Feel free to rework my own ideas.
In Cult, it would become the Invoker obviously.
